name: Showdown of the Dark Lords / Blob Wars
name_original: Showdown of the Dark Lords / Blob Wars
description:
It's time for a duel! Two Dark Lords face off against each other for the control of the same region. 

Fight against your friends in local multiplayer in this Tactical game!

CREDITS:

Vincent Tourenne : Game Design, Level Design, Sound Design, Programmation, Game Art 

Erwan Lozac'h : Lead Programmation, Level Design, Documentation 

Alexis De Almeida : Lead Level Design, UI Design, Level Building 

Taha Fekhaoui : Level Building, Game Art
